results.name: Decimal expansion of tanh(1).
comment: Also decimal expansion of tan(i)/i. - _N. J. A. Sloane_, Feb 12 2010
By the Lindemann-Weierstrass theorem, this constant is transcendental. - _Charles R Greathouse IV_, May 14 2019

formula: Equals Sum_{k>=1} bernoulli(2*k)*2^(2*k)*(2^(2*k)-1)/(2*k)!, where bernoulli(k) = A027641(k)/A027642(k) is the k-th Bernoulli number. - _Amiram Eldar_, Aug 19 2020
